article_html: Interpol has issued a global alert over diet pills that last month claimed the life of 21-year-old Eloise Parry, from Shropshire. In an interview recorded on 21 April, her mother Fiona talks about her daughter's death from the pills that she bought online. She says that even though she was able to drive herself to hospital, staff would never have been able to save her
text: Interpol has issued a global alert over diet pills that last month claimed the life of 21-year-old Eloise Parry, from Shropshire. In an interview recorded on 21 April, her mother Fiona talks about her daughter's death from the pills that she bought online. She says that even though she was able to drive herself to hospital, staff would never have been able to save her
title: Eloise Parry's mother on the death of her daughter after taking diet pills – video
